BTTTriggerConfig.BTTTouchBarAppleScriptString: set s to seconds of (current date)set value to do shell script "sh ~/Developer/cryptotool/coinmarketcap ripple"set symbol to do shell script "echo " & value & " | cut -d ':' -f 1"set usd to do shell script "echo " & value & " | cut -d ':' -f 2"set eur to do shell script "echo " & value & " | cut -d ':' -f 3"set change to do shell script "echo " & value & " | cut -d ':' -f 4"if s mod 9 < 3 then	# return symbol & " $" & usd	return "$" & usdend ifif s mod 9 < 6 then	# return symbol & " €" & eur	return "€" & eurend if# return symbol & " " & change & "%"return change & "%"
